Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, north of the Fairy Dust Inn.
Room.LongDescription: Many of the town's visitors and guests come from the ocean, primarilly because traveling by ship is the safest means of travel. The ocean is relatively calm and pirates have not been spotted all that often because the ships always follow the coastline. Barbarian raiders have been known to attack caravans and travelers moving across the open plains. The Fairy Dust Inn, to the south, provides comfortable lodgings for guests, close to the Nylandian Bay and the Catlania Docks.
